title: Cinderella Dressed in Ashes
description: Loki is controlled by the Queen through his Dreamhunter's Fleece, and he's now Snow White's enemy. No one's sure what the Queen of Sorrow wants to do next, and what her plans with Sorrow are.In another Dreamory, they learn who Cinderella really is, where she came from, her relationship with Snow, and what historical period she'd affected with what she calls the Forbidden Art.The Second installment of the Grimm Diaries.This Diary continues the adventure, from Snow White's POV.
author: Cameron Jace
